function EP_BAD_07()

  -- なぜなのボク姫
  SaveData.Title = "なぜなのボク姫"

  SAVE()

  -- //エリカルートEP5の姫選挙に失敗した際に発生。

LAYER_CLEAR_ALL()

LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)

-- //SE：開始音（ﾃﾚﾃﾃﾚﾃﾃｰ!!）
PLAY_SE("SEz006.wav")
-- //BG：なぜなのボク姫（開始）

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano01.wav")
  MSG([[
  【????】
 "Three!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano02.wav")
  MSG([[
  【????】
 "Two!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano03.wav")
  MSG([[
  【????】
 "One!" ]])

  PLAY_BGM("BGM07.wav",0,true)
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG028aa")
  LAYER_SCALE(LAYER_BG,500,500)
  LAYER_MOVE_SCALE(LAYER_BG,100,100,500,Ease.OutSine)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

  EFFECT_SCREEN(1,30,30,500,false,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano04.wav")
  MSG([[
  【????】
 "Boom!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano05.wav")
  MSG([[
  【????】
 "Wheeeeee!" ]])

  -- //BG：なぜなのボク姫背景
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG028ba")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask023",1000,false)

  -- //BU：ミナト（笑顔）、アキラ・メヒＴ（通常）
  --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01ea")
  --LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04aa")
  --LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)
  --PLAY_BGM("BGM07.wav",1000,true)
  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01ea")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
  LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-400,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04aa")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
  LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,400,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano06.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato・Akira】
 "Why, Bokuhime?!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano07.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "Everyone, please gather around!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano08.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "Even if you reach a bad end, no worries! It's time for Why, Bokuhime? where we explain why you got that ending!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano09.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "Gather around..." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01fa")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano99.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "So, what reason is there this time for being so low-energy?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano100.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "Because by this point, there’s nothing left to advise. I just want you to look back on the scenarios so far." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01da")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano101.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "W-well, that’s true enough though." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04ba")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano102.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "Hey Nippon Ichi Software. You’ve noticed too, haven’t you? That this corner has been broken from the start—" ]])

  -- //BU：ミナト（笑顔）、アキラ・雑
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI05aa")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("zatsu01.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Relaxed Akira】
 "Minachin" ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01ca")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano103_1.0.1.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "Akira...!? Why does your appearance look so rough!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("zatsu01.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Relaxed Akira】
 "Minachin" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano104.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "Eh, you keep calling my name, what’s up? Give me a proper answer, Akira!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("zatsu01.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Relaxed Akira】
 "Minachin" ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01ga")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano105.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "C-cannot hold a conversation...!? Could it be that pointing out what the creators care about stripped away her consciousness!?" ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01ba")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano106.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "H-how cruel, Nippon Ichi Software (the publisher of this game)! Give me back my precious Akira, please!" ]])

  -- //BU：エリカ・雑、アキラ・雑
  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI09aa")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("zatsu02.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Relaxed Erika】
 "Neesan" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("zatsu01.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Relaxed Akira】
 "Minachin" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("zatsu02.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Relaxed Erika】
 "Neesan" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("zatsu01.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Relaxed Akira】
 "Minachin" ]])

  -- //BG：なぜなのボク姫（おわり）
  STOP_BGM(1000)
  LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
  WAIT_INPUT(1000)

  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG028ca")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
  WAIT_INPUT(1000)

PLAY_VOICE("zatsu02.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Relaxed Erika】
 "Neesan" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("zatsu01.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Relaxed Akira】
 "Minachin" ]])

  -- //第５章［結-2］冒頭から再開
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
  WAIT_INPUT(1000)


  -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
WAIT_INPUT(1000)

SystemSaveData.IsClearEP_BAD_07 = true;
ScenarioManager.Next(SaveData.BadNextScenario)
SaveData.BadNextScenario = ""

end
